materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a valley in Chumba, Punjab. In the background, there are several mountain-tops in the distance. The foreground features thick vegetation, and tall trees along the hill on the right, with a lone tall tree on the left of the photograph. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Chumba Valley, Punjab
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Punjab (India) Valleys Mountains
